testimonials.name: Rajesh Shrestha
testimonials.text: Yukti Group helped me import electronics from China for my shop. The entire process was smooth and they handled all the customs paperwork. My business has grown 300% since working with them!

testimonials.name: Sita Kumari Thapa
testimonials.text: Their tech team built an amazing website for my handicraft business. Now I get orders from all over Nepal and even international customers. Yukti Group understands local business needs perfectly.

testimonials.name: Anil Gurung
testimonials.text: I was struggling to source quality products for my store. Yukti Group connected me with reliable suppliers and now I have a steady supply chain. Their support team is always available when I need help.
